=== About Me ===

I'm a 24 year old Research Assistant within University of Brighton and have been a user of GNU/Linux now for around 4 years, and currently run Ubuntu/Kubuntu on my desktops/laptops/servers at home.  Within work I'm currently running Ubuntu on my desktop as well as on our graphical rendering cluster.

I'm a member of both <nowiki>[[http://sussex.lug.org.uk/|SLUG]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.brighton.lug.org.uk/|BLUG]]</nowiki>.

=== Things I do for Ubuntu ===

==== Support ====

* I help out with <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~dave-greenacre/+commentedtickets|support]]</nowiki> tickets and <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~dave-greenacre/+karma|bugs]]</nowiki>.
* I help out with support within the ubuntu IRC channel, details can be found <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-uk.org/|here]]</nowiki>.

==== Development ====

* I'm currently packaging <nowiki>[[http://cpptest.sourceforge.net/|cpptest]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://opensg.vrsource.org/trac|opensg]]</nowiki> for ubtunu and these can be found <nowiki>[[http://foss.it.brighton.ac.uk/epoch/|here]]</nowiki> for the time been.
